DOC.brief_title: Comparison Nutritional Products People With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Signed date informed consent form Type 2 diabetes 18 75 year age Male nonpregnant , nonlactating female , least 6 week postpartum If female childbearing potential , practice birth control BMI great equal 18.5 kg/m2 less 40.0 kg/m2 Medications , antihyperglycemic thyroid medication hormone therapy , maintain constant dosage least two month prior screen visit Uses exogenous insulin glucose control Type 1 diabetes History diabetic ketoacidosis Current infection ; receive corticosteroid treatment last 3 month , surgery receive antibiotic last 3 week Active malignancy Significant cardiovascular event le 12 week prior study entry End stage organ failure status post organ transplant Has active metabolic , hepatic , gastrointestinal disease may interfere nutrient absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion exclude diabetes Chronic , contagious , infectious disease , active tuberculosis , Hepatitis B C , HIV Taking herbal , dietary supplement medication , antihyperglycemic medication past four week could profoundly affect blood glucose Fainted experience adverse reaction response blood collection prior study Has clot bleed disorder Allergic intolerant ingredient find study product Participant concomitant trial conflict study
